summary.name: summary
summary.value: Zend_Gdata unit tests failing after applying r6351

description.name: description
description.value:
Regression tests for Zend_Gdata currently are currently failing, including a '400 Bad Request' error during the online tests. I've traced this back to r6351, which was a patch for ZF-1947.

Test output:

{quote}
% phpunit Zend_Gdata_AllTests
PHPUnit 3.0.6 by Sebastian Bergmann.

.........................................
.........................................
.........................................
.........................................
.........................................
.........................................
.............................F.FFFF....F.
FFFF.....................................
.........................................
.........................................
.........................................
.........................................
.........................................
.........................................
...................E..............

Time: 01:08

There was 1 error:

1) testCreateAndUpdateEvent(Zend_Gdata_CalendarOnlineTest)
Zend_Gdata_App_HttpException: Expected response code 200, got 400
library/Zend/Gdata/App.php:506
library/Zend/Gdata/App.php:632
library/Zend/Gdata/App/Entry.php:177
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarOnlineTest.php:127
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarOnlineTest.php:144
There were 10 failures:

1) testEntryCount(Zend_Gdata_CalendarFeedCompositeTest)
Failed asserting that <integer:7> is equal to <integer:6>.
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:117

2) testId(Zend_Gdata_CalendarFeedCompositeTest)
Failed asserting that <string:http://www.google.com/calendar/feeds/default/private/composite/lq2ai6imsbq209q3aeturho50g> is equal to <string:http://www.google.com/calendar/feeds/default/private/composite/sh6kv08egsls7mc5tf6np8hi9c>.
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:79
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:168

3) testPublished(Zend_Gdata_CalendarFeedCompositeTest)
Failed asserting that <string:2007-05-09T16:44:38.000Z> is equal to <string:2007-05-24T20:49:14.000Z>.
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:79
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:186

4) testUpdated(Zend_Gdata_CalendarFeedCompositeTest)
Failed asserting that <string:2007-05-17T10:33:49.000Z> is equal to <string:2007-05-24T20:49:14.000Z>.
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:79
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:209

5) testTitle(Zend_Gdata_CalendarFeedCompositeTest)
Failed asserting that <string:all day event may 24> is equal to <string:Tennis Game>.
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:79
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:232

6) testTransparency(Zend_Gdata_CalendarFeedCompositeTest)
Failed asserting that <string:http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#event.transparent> is equal to <string:http://schemas.google.com/g/2005#event.opaque>.
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:79
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:315

7) testWhen(Zend_Gdata_CalendarFeedCompositeTest)
Failed asserting that <integer:0> is equal to <integer:1>.
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:348

8) testWhere(Zend_Gdata_CalendarFeedCompositeTest)
Failed asserting that <string:Mountain View, California> is equal to <string:South Tennis Courts>.
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:60
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:377

9) testComments(Zend_Gdata_CalendarFeedCompositeTest)
Failed asserting that <boolean:false> is identical to <boolean:true>.
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:394

10) testRecurrence(Zend_Gdata_CalendarFeedCompositeTest)
Failed asserting that <string:DTSTART;VALUE=DATE:20070501 DTEND;VALUE=DATE:20070502 RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;BYDAY=Tu;UNTIL=20070904> is equal to <text>.
--- Expected
+++ Actual
@@ -1,10 +1 @@
-DTSTART;TZID=America/Los_Angeles:20070913T080000
-    DTEND;TZID=America/Los_Angeles:20070913T090000
-    RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20070920T150000Z;WKST=SU BEGIN:VTIMEZONE
-    TZID:America/Los_Angeles X-LIC-LOCATION:America/Los_Angeles
-    BEGIN:DAYLIGHT TZOFFSETFROM:-0800 TZOFFSETTO:-0700 TZNAME:PDT
-    DTSTART:19700308T020000 RRULE:FREQ=YEARLY;BYMONTH=3;BYDAY=2SU
-    END:DAYLIGHT BEGIN:STANDARD TZOFFSETFROM:-0700 TZOFFSETTO:-0800
-    TZNAME:PST DTSTART:19701101T020000
-    RRULE:FREQ=YEARLY;BYMONTH=11;BYDAY=1SU END:STANDARD
-    END:VTIMEZONE
\ No newline at end of file
+DTSTART;VALUE=DATE:20070501 DTEND;VALUE=DATE:20070502 RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;BYDAY=Tu;UNTIL=20070904
\ No newline at end of file

tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:79
tests/Zend/Gdata/CalendarFeedCompositeTest.php:459

FAILURES!
Tests: 608, Failures: 10, Errors: 1.
{quote}

value.name: Zend_Gdata
value.description: Class interface to Google Data API's.

value.body: This doesn't effect 1.0.2 because these changes weren't merged into the branch.
